last_episode_to_air.name: Hold My Earrings
last_episode_to_air.overview: The Plaths arrive in St. Pete for their long-awaited family band concert but things quickly go awry when Moriah reveals news that no one saw coming. Barry is finally confronted with Ken and must choose to talk or walk. Olivia finally decides to put down roots.

name: Welcome to Plathville
overview: The nine flaxen-haired children in the Plath family have never had a soda, don't know who Spiderman or Tom Brady is and have never watched TV, living remotely in rural Georgia with their "follow their own rules" parents Kim and Barry Plath.

episodes.name: Meet the Plaths
episodes.overview: Nine flaxen-haired children from the Plath family have never had a soda, don't know pop-culture icons and have never watched TV, live in rural Georgia with their parents Kim and Barry Plath.

episodes.name: Starving for Independence
episodes.overview: Kim allows Moriah to go to San Francisco with Olivia; Ethan finds creative ways to pass the time while Olivia is gone.

episodes.name: Mom's Gonna Find Out
episodes.overview: Barry and Kim leave the farm for a night to celebrate their anniversary, putting Micah and Lydia in charge; the Plath kids party and some uninvited guests join them.

episodes.name: The Big Announcement
episodes.overview: Kim takes Moriah on her first college tour. Micah nearly jeopardizes his modeling career before it even begins. Ethan & Olivia plan an outing for the family with some surprises in store including news from Moriah that leaves the Kim & Barry shocked.

episodes.name: A Family Divided
episodes.overview: The Plath family has seen some major changes recently -- they left the farm and moved into town, Micah and Moriah fled the nest, and Ethan and Olivia cut ties with Kim and Barry. Although they all live within a mile, the distance has never been so great.

episodes.name: My Mystery Man
episodes.overview: Micah reunites with model-friend Helena for a very hot and steamy modeling session. Barry and Isaac try to talk about the birds and the bees. Lydia reveals she has a secret crush, and Moriah goes on her first date ever.

episodes.name: You Can't Stop The Girl
episodes.overview: Ethan is left speechless after Olivia gets a body piercing. Ethan and Olivia host Micah and Moriah for their first ever Independence Day. Kim, Barry and the kids head back to the farm to welcome visitors from down under.

episodes.name: Open To Falling In Love
episodes.overview: Ethan and Olivia realize they need to move farther away from Kim and Barry.

episodes.name: Friend Or Boyfriend?
episodes.overview: Moriah keeps her promise to Max and introduces him to her family.

episodes.name: A Moment Of Doubt
episodes.overview: Ethan and Olivia plan to get couples tattoos.

episodes.name: The Open Road
episodes.overview: Lydia talks with Kim about her crush, and Ethan meets Olivia in California.

episodes.name: I Came To Say Goodbye
episodes.overview: After a long period of no contact, Ethan decides to confront his parents. Kim makes an unexpected confession that leaves Moriah speechless. Micah signs a modeling contract while Moriah records music in a studio.

episodes.name: What's Up Sugar Bum?
episodes.overview: Max recruits Micah and Lydia to help out with a secret surprise for Moriah. Ethan and Olivia's relationship is on the rocks. Lydia prays for a family reconciliation with Ethan, and a change encounter takes her one step closer.

episodes.name: A Runaway Freight Train
episodes.overview: Lydia and Ethan reconnect for the first time in months. Micah takes Helena to meet Ethan and Olivia, which raises questions if they are more than friends. Also, Max fears Ethan and Olivia don't approve of him, and Lydia opens up about her crush to Kim.

episodes.name: Her Little Power Move
episodes.overview: Ethan puts his foot down about his mom coming onto his property. Moriah and Olivia talk babies, birth control and boys. Also, the Plath family has an unexpected surprise for Micah on his 20th birthday.

episodes.name: I'm Gonna Lose My Mind
episodes.overview: Olivia plans a fun day with Ethan, Moriah, Max and Micah, but an argument nearly derails it. Moriah faces a tough choice. Olivia and Micah do a sexy photo shoot. Lydia tries to practice self control when it comes to communication with her crush.

episodes.name: You Were The One That Changed
episodes.overview: Max and Lydia go on a secret mission. Tension between Ethan and Kim threatens a plan for him and his brothers to hang out. Moriah faces a tough choice for her band. Ethan and Olivia reach a critical point in their relationship as the idea of a move looms.

episodes.name: Is This A Date?
episodes.overview: Olivia's therapy session leaves her contemplating some major changes with Ethan. Moriah and Max debate over her revealing outfits. Barry takes Isaac and Micah golfing for some quality father and son time. Micah goes on a date with Helena.

episodes.name: If You Got It, Flaunt It
episodes.overview: Olivia goes on a girls' trip with Helena and Moriah in hopes that it will be a stress reliever from her current marital problems. Sparks fly as Micah goes on a date with a girl he met online. Ethan takes extreme measures to cope with Olivia's absence.

episodes.name: A Tiny Pair Of Shorts
episodes.overview: Ethan returns from his mysterious road trip and shares important news with Olivia. Micah gets a wakeup call from his agent in Atlanta. Moriah shops with Kim and Max's mom for outfits for her upcoming gig but struggles to be honest with Kim.

episodes.name: This Is Your Only First Concert
episodes.overview: Ethan and Olivia take steps to reconcile their marriage. Barry and Kim learn that they aren't invited to Moriah's gig, and Kim is forced to make a choice that is best for her, Moriah and Olivia.

episodes.name: Wanna Get A Room?
episodes.overview: Moriah, Micah and Olivia face performing on stage amidst family drama, and Ethan takes action. Max surprises Moriah with a special gift, Olivia offers Ethan an invitation, and Lydia takes steps to advance her own relationship.

episodes.name: I Wanna Be A Pirate
episodes.overview: Ethan and Olivia go camping with Micah and Moriah, but navigating their marital issues makes things a bit awkward for the group. Lydia struggles to stop texting her special friend, which puts her in the hot seat with Kim and Barry for the first time ever.

episodes.name: I Want To Talk To Your Parents
episodes.overview: Lydia graduates high school and gets a very special visit. Micah, Moriah, Ethan, Olivia and Max decide it's time to move on from Cairo, but Olivia has one last thing to do before leaving town -- face her fears with Kim and Barry.

episodes.name: The Universe Had Different Plans
episodes.overview: Life for the Plaths is more different now than ever before. Kim shares a shocking revelation while Moriah hides a massive secret. Ethan and Olivia continue to mend their marriage in Tampa as Micah takes in all that Los Angeles has to offer.

episodes.name: I Took Things a Little Too Far
episodes.overview: Micah meets with Max to get to the bottom of Max and Moriah's breakup. The divide between Kim and Barry quickly grows, leaving the future uncertain. Moriah opens up to her family about her breakup, resulting in questions that leave her stunned.

episodes.name: Missed Myself
episodes.overview: Moriah tags along with Micah to go to LA where she shares more details of her breakup, confirming Micah's suspicions. Ethan has a big secret he's keeping from Olivia. Tensions rise when Kim invites Nigel, a friend from the gym, to the house for dinner.

episodes.name: Double Life
episodes.overview: Kim and Barry's marital issues become undeniable, leaving the family reeling. Ethan keeps a secret from Olivia, but gets forced to reveal his hidden past. Moriah spends a cozy night with Nathan. Micah tries Indian food for the first time.

episodes.name: I Was Born In The Dining Room
episodes.overview: Olivia feels shocked when Ethan reveals that he's been keeping a secret from her for months. Micah goes on a double date. Kim opens up to the little girls about their separation, resulting in some very tense discussion.

episodes.name: Dirty Little Sinners
episodes.overview: Tensions are high in Tampa as Ethan returns home from Cairo to face Olivia. Moriah's ex-boyfriend posts a video on social media that releases a new flood of emotions. Kim comes to visit Moriah and opens up about her own relationship issues.

episodes.name: Eyes Down!
episodes.overview: Micah celebrates a wild 21st birthday at a strip club with Ethan and Olivia. Moriah confronts Lydia about her recent meet ups with Max. Kim moves back home, and she and Barry discuss the future of their relationship.

episodes.name: I Feel Like A Cow
episodes.overview: Barry reaches out to Ethan after two years with shocking news. Ethan's hesitation about seeing his mom leaves Kim feeling excluded from an important family discussion. Moriah and Olivia rebel against their past and try pole dancing!

episodes.name: You Have A Lot Of Nerve
episodes.overview: Kim and Micah share first-ever cocktails together, and Kim reveals the reasoning behind her parenting choices. After years, Ethan and Barry finally make amends, but Ethan keeps new secrets from Olivia. Lydia asks Kim tough questions.

episodes.name: I Wasn't Invited
episodes.overview: Micah bartends at his friend's art show, where things heat up with Antia. Meanwhile, the rest of the family reunites with Barry in Cairo, but Kim is excluded because Ethan and Olivia do not want to see her.

episodes.name: I'm Done Choosing
episodes.overview: The Plath children all gather at their farm to celebrate the birthday of their deceased brother. Everyone but Kim is invited, which has her feeling left out yet again. When Kim informs them that she will be at the gravesite, Olivia is overcome with panic.

episodes.name: You Know What You Did
episodes.overview: Micah goes on a romantic first date; despite the turmoil from the day at Joshua's gravesite, Ethan surprises Olivia with something special; Moriah's frustration with Olivia continues to brew; Kim is shocked when she learns Ethan wants to talk.

episodes.name: Everyone's Invited
episodes.overview: Ethan, Olivia, Micah and Moriah celebrate Ethan's birthday in Jamaica! The trip takes a turn when Micah and Moriah confront Olivia about her issues with Kim. Barry arranges a river trip, but when Olivia hears that Kim is going, she makes a tough decision.

episodes.name: Is This A Dagger Which I See Before Me?
episodes.overview: Ethan and Olivia's European trip is spoiled by controversy back home. Moriah makes a big decision without warning, then meets Micah in Cairo to discuss the fallout with their parents. Kim and Barry navigate the challenges that come with divorce and co-parenting children.

episodes.name: No Legacy Is So Rich As Honesty
episodes.overview: Ethan struggles to find balance as he is pulled between Olivia and his own family. Barry and Micah strengthen their new bond. Olivia reunites with her estranged sister and attempts to rebuild the past. Kim considers dating again as her divorce progresses.

episodes.name: To Thine Own Self Be True
episodes.overview: Kim and Micah discuss the divorce, and he is surprised to learn she's ready to start dating. Olivia and her siblings bond in a bold, new way. Barry and the boys have a fun night out but miss Ethan. Moriah continues her healing journey by getting baptized.

episodes.name: Life's But a Walking Shadow
episodes.overview: Frustrated by the rift between Olivia and his family, Ethan hopes time can heal their unresolved issues; Barry gets personal with Micah about the divorce; Moriah embraces her fresh start and her inner rebel.

episodes.name: Parting Is Such Sweet Sorrow
episodes.overview: Barry and Kim sit down with the kids to speak about more changes in the family. Moriah showcases her personal rebellion in the form of a tattoo. Ethan and Olivia say goodbye to Tampa while Moriah hosts her sisters for a special girls weekend.

episodes.name: Come What Come May...
episodes.overview: Ethan and Olivia have settled into their new town in Minnesota and express high hopes for their marriage. Micah questions his future in Los Angeles. Kim tells her friend about a major update in her love life, but she fears telling her own children.

episodes.name: Romeo, Romeo!
episodes.overview: Olivia and Ethan host Lydia Grace and her boyfriend for Christmas. Kim hesitantly sits down with Isaac, hoping he'll approve of her dating his flight instructor. Micah and Moriah struggle to reconcile with Ethan. Oliva and Ethan's marital tension resurfaces.

episodes.name: Now Is The Winter Of Our Discontent
episodes.overview: Kim starts new family traditions with the kids for Christmas. Barry and Micah spend the holidays alone. Olivia and Ethan confide in Lydia Grace and CJ that their marriage may have differences they can't overcome.

episodes.name: So Foul And Fair A Day
episodes.overview: Kim nervously shares her dating news with Moriah and Lydia. Moriah decides to unblock and text Ethan and is taken aback by his response. Olivia hits her breaking point when she realizes Ethan is up to his old ways.

episodes.name: I Am Not Bound To Please...
episodes.overview: Ethan leaves Olivia behind in Minnesota as he heads to Cairo to pick up his cars and reconnect with his family. Olivia talks to her friend about her marital issues and her struggle to stay true to her vows. Kim comes clean to Amber about Ken.

episodes.name: The Wheel Is Come Full Circle
episodes.overview: Kim and Barry are together for the first time since the family learned of Kim dating Ken. Moriah attempts to break the ice and reaches out to Ethan during his road trip. Olivia extends an olive branch to Micah, hoping he's willing to meet with her on her terms.

episodes.name: Off With His Head!
episodes.overview: Olivia and Ethan realize their marriage has reached an impasse due to differences in their values. Kim and Barry find it difficult to peacefully co-parent. Barry and Isaac visit Micah in LA and hope Ethan will join them despite his troubled marriage.

episodes.name: Lose Mine Honor, Lose Myself
episodes.overview: The Plath men go surfing in LA, and Barry and Ethan have a heart-to-heart. Olivia takes a trip to get some clarity on her marriage. Moriah crashes boys' weekend and comes face to face with Ethan for the first time in nearly a year. Ken pops an unexpected question to Kim.

episodes.name: To Be Or Not To Be...
episodes.overview: Ethan and Moriah's feud comes to a head as they hash out past disagreements. Kim moves the remainder of her things out of the family home. Ethan and Olivia have an honest conversation about the future of their relationship.

episodes.name: You Kept the Plants Alive
episodes.overview: Life in Plathville is looking very different these days. Moriah leaves Tampa behind. Kim throws caution to the wind and fulfills a lifelong dream and Micah walks away from his busy life in LA when a mysterious girl steals his heart.

episodes.name: Never Say Never
episodes.overview: Ethan and Olivia remain at odds over the future of their marriage, Kim ponders her next steps with Ken, and Ethan visits Cairo and reveals big news to his family. A visit to a tarot card reader leaves Olivia reeling and questioning her future.

episodes.name: They're All Freaks Here
episodes.overview: The Plath men bond over their muscles at the gym, Olivia takes a huge leap and steps into the single scene with her sister, and Ethan decides it's time to break the ice and visit his mom.

episodes.name: You're Like a Stranger to Me Now
episodes.overview: Ethan and Moriah bond over drinks. Kim gives Micah some relationship advice. Olivia drives to Minnesota hoping to finalize the divorce but detours when Moriah asks her to meet up to hash things out.

episodes.name: How Do I Get Rizz?
episodes.overview: Olivia returns to Minnesota to finalize the divorce but Ethan struggles to accept the end of their marriage. The Plaths navigate their new blended family with Kim's boyfriend. Micah contemplates settling down with his girlfriend and Moriah enlists Kim's help with making a music video.

episodes.name: Give Me Your Mud
episodes.overview: The Plath family comes together to run the Spartan Race but things get muddy when their family bonding event turns competitive; Olivia and Ethan take time to rediscover themselves; Micah's mystery girlfriend leaves everyone stunned.

episodes.name: I Was Born On Highway 111
episodes.overview: Kim and Barry deal with the frustration of a drawn-out divorce. Back in LA, Olivia shares with her friend where things went wrong with Ethan and what she's looking for in her next relationship. Ethan and Micah return to Cairo to help throw a surprise birthday party for Lydia.

episodes.name: Wine Helps The Sex Ed Go Down
episodes.overview: While Micah and his girlfriend embrace their future together, Ethan returns to the farm and gets real about some of the ways he and Olivia went wrong. Moriah talks music and heartbreak with her bestie and Olivia and Lydia Grace rebel against their roots and host a sex party!

episodes.name: That's What Walls Are For
episodes.overview: The entire Plath family joins Moriah in Tampa to prep for her music video shoot but concerns grow over Kim and Barry being able to sleep under one roof. Olivia and Lydia Grace try their luck at speed dating, but no one measures up to a certain someone Olivia already has her eye on.

episodes.name: I Love You. I Love You.
episodes.overview: Olivia and her long-distance boyfriend rendezvous in Arizona for a romantic getaway. It's lights, camera, action for the Plaths as they help Moriah shoot a music video for her new album. As Veronica gets to know Kim, she quickly learns its Kim's way or the highway.

episodes.name: I Grew Up Under A Rock
episodes.overview: When Ethan's friend takes him out to a bar to meet girls for the first time ever, its sink or swim when a girl catches his eye. Veronica lets it be known to Micah she's ready for next steps. Olivia brings Lydia Grace and Brendan together, hoping they'll form a bond but Lydia Grace has her concerns.

episodes.name: Hold My Earrings
episodes.overview: The Plaths arrive in St. Pete for their long-awaited family band concert but things quickly go awry when Moriah reveals news that no one saw coming. Barry is finally confronted with Ken and must choose to talk or walk. Olivia finally decides to put down roots.
